mapper.sql: p.id, p.kind, p.name, p.title, p.code, p.price, p.postage, p.points, p.default_sku_id, p.brand_id, p.type_id, p.type_id_tree, p.uid, p.specification, p.specificationats, p.status, p.onshelf, p.keyword, p.image_url, p.create_time, p.update_time, p.update_by, p.new_recommend, p.hot_recommend, p.fine_recommend, p.type_recommend, p.quantum, p.sort, p.tags, p.start_time, p.end_time
mapper.select:
select
,t.id as t_id ,t.name as t_name from td_product as p LEFT OUTER JOIN td_product_type t ON p.type_id=t.id where 1=1 and p.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

kind = #{kind,jdbcType=TINYINT},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
